name: web_project
description: 1. Make sure to have installed Node.js 2. Go to your project and type 'npm init' to install npm package 3. Type 'npm install gulp-cli' to install gulp in your command line on your project 4. Type 'npm install gulp --save-dev' to install gulp  5. Create a file named: 'gulpfile.js'
author: Sturz Flaviu
